problem.titleLine1: Working with a single Claude Code terminal
problem.description: When your entire workflow depends on one AI chat or terminal, things get messy fast. No real-time visibility into what Claude Code is editing, lost context between projects, repeated prompts, and no notifications when tasks complete.

painPoints.switching: Constantly switching tabs and losing context across projects.
painPoints.noView: No real-time visibility. You can't see what Claude Code is changing.
painPoints.repeating: Sessions lose context and you repeat the same prompts.
painPoints.confidence: Hard to trust AI changes without live change tracking.

solution.description: CodeAgentSwarm is an AI coding workspace where up to six Claude Code terminals work in parallel with real-time visibility, live notifications, full conversation history and seamless multiproject management. You never lose context.

points.terminals: Six Claude Code terminals running simultaneously.
points.notifications: Real-time notifications when agents finish or need input.
points.git: Integrated Git panel with live diffs and commit context.
points.kanban: MCP-powered Kanban your agents can read and update.
points.mcp: MCP Marketplace: GitHub, Notion, Slack, Supabase, Brave Search, Playwright, PostgreSQL, and more.
points.history: Full Claude Code conversation history. Search any session instantly.
points.fileTracking: Real-time change tracking so you always know what each agent modified.

whyUpgrade.title: Why upgrade to Pro?
whyUpgrade.description: Pro is built for heavy Claude Code users who need 6 terminals, unlimited projects and full MCP integration. Parallel terminals reduce waiting time and context switching, while keyboard shortcuts, advanced layouts and permissions help you keep all your agents in sync. Many workflows that used to take multiple steps can now be handled in a single focused session.

items.q1: How do I use multiple Claude Code terminals with CodeAgentSwarm?
items.a1: CodeAgentSwarm makes multi-terminal Claude Code setup simple. Just open the app and you can run up to 6 Claude Code terminals simultaneously. Each terminal operates independently, letting you work on different tasks or projects in parallel with full real-time visibility.
items.q2: How does CodeAgentSwarm handle project-level organization?
items.a2: CodeAgentSwarm lets you manage multiple Claude Code projects seamlessly. Switch between projects without losing context. Each project maintains its own terminal configurations, task boards, and conversation history. It's an AI multiproject workspace designed for developers juggling multiple codebases.
items.q3: Do I get real-time visibility and live change tracking?
items.a3: Yes! CodeAgentSwarm provides real-time coding visibility with live diffs so you can see AI code changes in real-time. Dynamic terminal titles show what each Claude Code agent is working on, and the file tracking system highlights exactly what changed and when.
items.q4: Does CodeAgentSwarm support Claude Code notifications?
items.a4: Absolutely. You get real-time notifications for AI coding events. When any Claude Code terminal finishes a task, needs your input, or encounters an error, you'll know instantly. Never miss an update with instant desktop notifications.
items.a5: CodeAgentSwarm saves your complete Claude Code conversation history across all sessions. Search any past chat, decision, or code snippet instantly. Session history is fully searchable, so you never lose context or have to repeat explanations.
items.q6: Can I control what Claude Code has access to?
items.a6: Yes. CodeAgentSwarm provides visual Claude Code permission settings to manage file access and actions. You can configure what each terminal can access, approve sensitive operations, and maintain a secure AI coding environment while using Turbo Mode for safe actions.
items.q7: Does CodeAgentSwarm support MCP tools and the MCP marketplace?
items.a7: Yes! CodeAgentSwarm includes full MCP integration with a built-in MCP marketplace. Connect Claude Code to GitHub, Notion, Slack, Supabase, Brave Search, Playwright, PostgreSQL and more. MCP tools extend what your Claude Code agents can do.
items.q8: Does CodeAgentSwarm help prevent context loss in Claude Code?
items.a8: Yes. CodeAgentSwarm keeps a synchronized conversation history across terminals, shows real time changes from each agent and links project structure with terminal context. This prevents Claude Code from forgetting past actions or losing track during multi step work.

hero.headline: Join the Open Beta
hero.subheadline: Join the Open Beta and unlock the full Pro experience while we refine CodeAgentSwarm. Try 6 synchronized Claude Code terminals with real time visibility, notifications and full conversation history.
hero.microcopy: Works on macOS (Apple Silicon). Requires a Claude Code subscription.

step1.title: Fill in the beta form
step1.description: Tell us your email and basic setup so we can prepare your Pro (Beta) access.

step2.title: Download the app & create your account
step2.description: Install CodeAgentSwarm on macOS and sign in with the SAME email (Google, GitHub or Discord login supported).

step3.title: Join our Discord & share feedback
step3.description: Joining the CodeAgentSwarm Discord is REQUIRED for the beta, since feedback is a condition for free Pro access.

howToJoin.note: No credit card required. Full Pro access during the beta in exchange for your feedback.

pricing.banner: During the Open Beta, the Pro tier is 100% free. Create your account, submit your email and we'll unlock Pro for you.

banner.text: We're in Open Beta - Get the full Pro experience for free

items.a1: Yes. During the Open Beta, the entire Pro tier is free - all features unlocked, no credit card required.
items.q2: Do I need a Claude Code subscription?
items.a2: Yes. CodeAgentSwarm works on top of Claude Code, which powers all agentic reasoning, coding, parallel tasks and MCP tools. You need an active Claude Code subscription to run the agents.
items.a3: Highly recommended. If you work on multiple projects, heavy refactors, large codebases or parallel tasks, Max delivers better performance and higher request limits.
items.q4: Why do I need to join Discord?
items.a4: Beta requires feedback. Discord is where we post updates, take feedback, fix bugs, and share Beta builds.
items.q5: What happens when the Beta ends?
items.a5: You choose: stay on Free, upgrade to Pro, or stop using the app. No automatic charges. Founders who join during the beta will keep the original Pro price forever.
items.a7: No. All code stays on your local machine.
items.q8: How long does Pro activation take?
items.a8: Usually a few hours after you complete all steps.
items.q9: Does CodeAgentSwarm support multi-project workflows with Claude Code?
items.a9: Yes! CodeAgentSwarm is designed for multiproject management. Switch between Claude Code projects without losing context. Each project maintains its own terminals, tasks and conversation history. Manage multiple Claude Code projects seamlessly in one workspace.
